tool_description: Calculates competitive salary ranges based on role, location, experience level, and market data.

job_title.description: The job title to calculate salary for

location.description: City and state/country for location-based adjustment

experience_level.description: Experience level: entry, mid, senior, lead, executive

company_size.description: Company size: startup, small, medium, large, enterprise

error_messages: Invalid experience level: Must be one of [entry, mid, senior, lead, executive].
Invalid company size: Must be one of [startup, small, medium, large, enterprise].
Location not found: The specified location is not in our salary database.
Insufficient data: Not enough market data available for the specified role and location combination.
usage: Provide job title, location, and experience level. Optionally specify company size and industry for more accurate salary calculations.

base_salary_min.description: Minimum base salary in local currency

base_salary_max.description: Maximum base salary in local currency

currency.description: Currency code for the salary figures

confidence_score.description: Confidence score of the salary estimate (0-1)
